resources.string: Sorry, no tutors available at this time

This app was created to demonstrate how beacons could help to display relevant information where it was needed; as in showing a notification (if bluetooth is activated) with the available tutors when entering the area where the tutors are. The app itself will always show the available tutors, or notify you if there are no tutors available.


For feedback or suggestions please use the feedback-button at the bottom of the screen.


Created by Jan Sch√∏pp for Pace Mobile Labs.

To use the notification feature, just activate bluetooth and you will receive a notification with the available tutors, if you are in the Seidenberg Lounge. You don\'t need to have the app open to receive the notification, but if you are already within the space and have received the notification, you can always open the app to quickly check the availability of the tutors.
\n\nIf notifications are not working even though you have bluetooth activated, please make sure you have given the app permission to use your location. This is needed to find out if you are in the Seidenberg Lounge.
